vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 651 for a college on property zoned R-1/2ac(A) District, at the southeast corner of Walnut Street and Abrams Road
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval, subject to a revised site plan and conditions
Z201-209(LG)
